relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I often found security guards sleeping on the 3rd floor of the Potter Center.
There's this thing called Student Government which is a bunch of weird unbathed students, discussing anime all day. There's another thing called Men of Merit which is a black supremacy group.
Rules are too tight. No classic dorm experience to be had here.
Easy stuff. Only challenges here are moronic teachers.
If you must attend a Community College, attend a different one.
Incredibly unprofessional and inexperienced staff. Educational standards barely stand out above most high schools. This is the last stop students make, before giving up on life.

textAfterTable: Yes, I plan to. Login to rate or flag the reviews Sara from Ypsilanti, MI 12/25/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 40 Categories Comments Great for these types of students It's great for EVERYONE. Tips for prospective students Go in with lots of questions to make sure you get all of your concerns taken care of. They'll help you with everything. Bang for the buck I am personally paying higher tuition since I am out of county but it's STILL very affordable. You get so much free help from the staff it definitely makes every dollar worth it. They strive to help you succeed. Not to mention, the Jackson Campus now has an on-site clinic for walk-in sickies. It literally only costs a few dollars to get prescriptions. Beyond affordable! Am enjoying being here
